ComicInfo.Title: Story of the Year!
ComicInfo.Summary: Spidey and Nikki, Matinex and Starhawk of the Guardians of the Galaxy meet up for the first time...and of course fight. They work things out and team up to fight Hammer and Anvil.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:43:48. [Issue ID 33770]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
